show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #72 Nicholaas Vos "The Farm Complements the Sheep"
subtitle: #72 Nicholaas Vos "The Farm Complements the Sheep"
summary:
My friend Nic drove over from the Southwest corner of Kansas, we spent several hours touring around the ranch, looked at the Beaver ponds, looked at my cows, grass and soil.
Join us in the Eastes Media Studio after a late lunch in at Legends Pub and Grille for Nic's story that has never been told.
We talk about how he came to this country and what it was like in his native South Africa.
